name: being soft
description:
1. be soft.
  2. be kind. 
  3. tell the ones you love that you love them.
  4. always strive to be a better person.
  5. take care of yourself.
  6. you are a light in the darkness.
  7. don't be so hard on yourself.
  8. take breaks often.
  9. sometimes, you'll have sad days, and that's ok.
  10. don't be jealous, be inspired.
  11. you are loved!

a small manifesto for the class experimental games. i experimented with limited palette and minimalist art somewhat akin to bitsy. all art, music, etc. is by me and created within a timespan of 2 hours.
